author: kfogel
msg: Follow up to r31750 with more code consolidation.
(svn_config_get_yes_no_ask): Use get_bool() here too, so that all our
code to parse config values into booleans is now in one place.
(svn_config_get_yes_no_ask): Update doc string.  The old doc string
did not cover the case where default_value is NULL.  While what would
happen now is different from what would have happened before, just
say the behavior is undefined, since neither the old nor the new
behavior should be considered part of the API.

author: epg
msg: Fix clean-javahl to clean all javahl files.
(JAVAHL_JAR): Add macro for path to svn-javahl.jar.

author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r31757.  Split merge_tests.py 94 into two separate tests.
r31757 expanded merge test 94 to cover another aspect of issue #3174,
specifically a merge to a target that has a subtree which was renamed
in the requested merge range.  The problem is actually more closely
so split the test into two.
(merge_chokes_on_renamed_subtrees): Use new helper, move part of test
